name: Bungalow
details: Our two room bungalows has private lobby and dinning facilities. All rooms are Double Bed, Toilet and bath with hot and cold water facilities. Bungalow charge Tk. 9000/++-. See food menu of our restaurants. Check-in time: 11:00 AM, Check-Out time: 10:00 AM

name: Glamping Tents
details: BDT 3500/++ per night. Glamping tents are non AC but we assure you tons of Natural Air :-) All the tents have 2 rooms and 5 beds with common toilet and shower facilities. See food menu of our restaurants. Check-in time: 11:00 AM, Check-Out time: 10:00 AM

name: School Activity Packages
details: Minimum Group Size: 8 person, Maximum Capacity: 100 Person (if you wish to join individually, please call 01995333111, 01952777999, 01942777999 for the next program date)
activity: On tree, On ground, Zip lines, Archery, football, cricket, Badminton, Leadership Development Activities, Rain forest Shower, Children activity areas
